name: NFT-Performance: [ r e ] b o r n
description:
The performance algorhytm: by purchasing this one art for your collection, you will receive three artworks, but not immediately. You will receive the second and third versions on the day of purchase in 2022 and 2023.
Only you and me will have this triptych, there will be no other versions. It's exclusive.

In this way, I will show through the same topic the evolution of my path as an nft-artist. And you will conduct an experiment, how the art will live its second and third reborn and increase in value. This is an investment in the long-term aftertaste from the art you have acquired, when your investment is not in an instant result, but in a process and unpredictable result in time.

If you see the light in my performance and want to save it - do it. It will worth it.

If you are not pure in heart and thoughts and want to use this acquisition in some dirty way, pass by, the non visual punishment for your dishonor will be much higher than the money spent. It's will not worth it.

With bless I shifting my child to digital consciousness. I believe that it will go into the right hands.

By Love, Evolucia.
